languages.text: "Сенешаль, Аддендум Префекториум Милитарум к Тактика Империум гласит, что офицер войск Империума, поддавшийся ксеновлиянию третьей категории и выше, считается предателем и еретиком. Я еретиков при себе не держу — приказываю одолеть морок. Исполнять, живо!"

traits.locale_text: "Сенешаль, Аддендум Префекториум Милитарум к Тактика Империум гласит, что офицер войск Империума, поддавшийся ксеновлиянию третьей категории и выше, считается предателем и еретиком. Я еретиков при себе не держу — приказываю одолеть морок. Исполнять, живо!"

languages.text: "Seneschal, the Addendum Prefectorium Militarum to the Tactica Imperium states that an army officer of the Imperium who submits to third-degree xeno-influence or higher is to be considered a traitor and a heretic. I will have no heretics under my command, Seneschal. I order you to conquer this illusion at once! Get to it, officer!"
languages.original_text: "Сенешаль, Аддендум Префекториум Милитарум к Тактика Империум гласит, что офицер войск Империума, поддавшийся ксеновлиянию третьей категории и выше, считается предателем и еретиком. Я еретиков при себе не держу — приказываю одолеть морок. Исполнять, живо!"

traits.locale_text: "Seneschal, the Addendum Prefectorium Militarum to the Tactica Imperium states that an army officer of the Imperium who submits to a third-degree xeno-influence or higher is to be considered a traitor and a heretic. I have no heretics under my command, Seneschal. I order you to conquer this illusion at once! And don't make me repeat myself!"

"Seneschal, the Addendum Prefectorium Militarum to the Tactica Imperium states that an army officer of the Imperium who submits to a third-degree xeno-influence or higher is to be considered a traitor and a heretic. I have no heretics under my command, Seneschal. I order you to conquer this illusion at once! And don't make me repeat myself!"

I have no heretics under my command, Seneschal. I order you to conquer this illusion at once! And don't make me repeat myself!"

"Seneschal, the Addendum Prefectorium Militarum to the Tactica Imperium states that an army officer of the Imperium who submits to a third-degree xeno-influence or higher is to be considered a traitor and a heretic. I have no heretics under my command, Seneschal. I order you to conquer this illusion at once! And don't make me repeat myself!"

"Seneschal, the Addendum Prefectorium Militarum to the Tactica Imperium states that an army officer of the Imperium who submits to third-degree xeno-influence or higher is to be considered a traitor and a heretic. I will have no heretics under my command, Seneschal. I order you to conquer this illusion at once! Get to it, officer!"

"Seneschal, the Addendum Prefectorium Militarum to the Tactica Imperium states that an army officer of the Imperium who submits to third-degree xeno-influence or higher is to be considered a traitor and a heretic. I will have no heretics under my command, Seneschal. I order you to conquer this illusion at once! Get to it, officer!"

languages.text: 「家令長、帝国戦術教本の軍事補遺によれば、帝国の陸軍士官で、第三級の異種族インフルエンスまたはそれ以上の者に服従する者は、裏切り者であり異端者であるとみなされるとのことだ。私の指揮下に異端者はいない、家令長。直ちにこの茶番をやめるよう命じる！早くしろ、士官！」
languages.original_text: "Seneschal, the Addendum Prefectorium Militarum to the Tactica Imperium states that an army officer of the Imperium who submits to third-degree xeno-influence or higher is to be considered a traitor and a heretic. I will have no heretics under my command, Seneschal. I order you to conquer this illusion at once! Get to it, officer!"

traits.locale_text: 「家令長、帝国戦術教本の軍事補遺によれば、帝国の陸軍士官で、第三級の異種族インフルエンスまたはそれ以上の者に服従する者は、裏切り者であり異端者であるとみなされるとのことだ。私の指揮下に異端者はいない、家令長。直ちにこの茶番をやめるよう命じる！早くしろ、士官！」

languages.text: “总领，根据《帝国军事战略法令》规定，帝国军官若是受到了三级或以上异形影响，会被立刻视为叛徒与异端分子。我绝不允许我的手下有异端分子，总领。我命令你立刻克服眼前的幻觉！立刻照办，总领！”
languages.original_text: "Seneschal, the Addendum Prefectorium Militarum to the Tactica Imperium states that an army officer of the Imperium who submits to third-degree xeno-influence or higher is to be considered a traitor and a heretic. I will have no heretics under my command, Seneschal. I order you to conquer this illusion at once! Get to it, officer!"

traits.locale_text: “总领，根据《帝国军事战略法令》规定，帝国军官若是受到了三级或以上异形影响，会被立刻视为叛徒与异端分子。我绝不允许我的手下有异端分子，总领。我命令你立刻克服这个幻觉！别再让我重复命令！”

languages.text: «Senescal, el Addendum Prefectorium Militarum a la Tactica Imperium establece que un oficial del ejército del Imperium que se someta a una influencia xenos de tercer grado o superior será considerado traidor y hereje. No toleraré herejes bajo mi mando, Senescal. ¡Le ordeno que supere este espejismo de inmediato! ¡No me haga esperar, oficial!».
languages.original_text: "Seneschal, the Addendum Prefectorium Militarum to the Tactica Imperium states that an army officer of the Imperium who submits to third-degree xeno-influence or higher is to be considered a traitor and a heretic. I will have no heretics under my command, Seneschal. I order you to conquer this illusion at once! Get to it, officer!"

traits.locale_text: «Senescal, el Addendum Prefectorium Militarum a la Tactica Imperium establece que un oficial del ejército del Imperium que se someta a una influencia xenos de tercer grado o superior será considerado traidor y hereje. No tengo herejes bajo mi mando, Senescal. ¡Le ordeno que supere este espejismo de inmediato! ¡Y no me haga repetirlo!».

languages.text: "Truchsess, das Addendum Präfectorium Militarum zum Tactica Imperium besagt, dass ein Armeeoffizier des Imperiums, der sich Xeno-Einfluss dritten oder höheren Grades unterwirft, als Verräter und Ketzer gilt. Ich werde keine Ketzer unter meinem Kommando dulden, Truchsess. Ich befehle Euch, diese Illusion augenblicklich zu besiegen! An die Arbeit, Offizier!"
languages.original_text: "Seneschal, the Addendum Prefectorium Militarum to the Tactica Imperium states that an army officer of the Imperium who submits to third-degree xeno-influence or higher is to be considered a traitor and a heretic. I will have no heretics under my command, Seneschal. I order you to conquer this illusion at once! Get to it, officer!"

traits.locale_text: "Truchsess, das Addendum Präfectorium Militarum zum Tactica Imperium besagt, dass ein Armeeoffizier des Imperiums, der sich Xeno-Einfluss dritten oder höheren Grades unterwirft, als Verräter und Ketzer gilt. Ich habe keine Ketzer unter meinem Kommando, Truchsess. Ich befehle Euch, diese Illusion augenblicklich zu besiegen! Und zwingt mich nicht, mich zu wiederholen!"

languages.text: « Sénéchal, l'Addendum Prefectorium Militarum du Tactica Imperium stipule que tout officier de l'Imperium qui se soumet à une xéno-influence de niveau trois ou supérieur doit être considéré comme un traître et un hérétique. Je ne saurais tolérer d'hérétique sous mes ordres, sénéchal. Je vous ordonne de vous libérer de cette illusion sur-le-champ ! Et plus vite que ça ! »
languages.original_text: "Seneschal, the Addendum Prefectorium Militarum to the Tactica Imperium states that an army officer of the Imperium who submits to third-degree xeno-influence or higher is to be considered a traitor and a heretic. I will have no heretics under my command, Seneschal. I order you to conquer this illusion at once! Get to it, officer!"

traits.locale_text: « Sénéchal, l'Addendum Prefectorium Militarum du Tactica Imperium stipule que tout officier de l'Imperium qui se soumet à une xéno-influence de niveau trois ou supérieur doit être considéré comme un traître et un hérétique. Je n'ai aucun hérétique sous mes ordres, sénéchal. Je vous ordonne de vous libérer de cette illusion sur-le-champ ! Et ne m'obligez pas à me répéter ! »

languages.text: "Seneşal efendi! İmparatorluk Taktikleri'nin Prefektoryum Militarum Zeyli'nde yazdığı üzere üçüncü yahut daha yüksek derece zeno nüfuzu altında kalmış tüm İmparatorluk ordusu subayları, artık hain ve kâfir sayılacaktır. Komutam altında kâfir olmasına göz yummam Seneşal. Derhâl bu yanılsamayı defetmeni emrediyorum! İşe koyul!"
languages.original_text: "Seneschal, the Addendum Prefectorium Militarum to the Tactica Imperium states that an army officer of the Imperium who submits to third-degree xeno-influence or higher is to be considered a traitor and a heretic. I will have no heretics under my command, Seneschal. I order you to conquer this illusion at once! Get to it, officer!"

traits.locale_text: "Seneşal efendi! İmparatorluk Taktikleri'nin Prefektoryum Militarum Zeyli'nde yazdığı üzere üçüncü yahut daha yüksek derece zeno nüfuzu altında kalmış tüm İmparatorluk ordusu subayları, artık hain ve kâfir sayılacaktır. Komutam altında kâfir olmasına göz yummam Seneşal. Derhâl bu yanılsamayı defetmeni emrediyorum! İşe koyul!"
